title: Why did I gain 11 lp?
body:
I won my recent game and gained 11 Lp, the game before that I won and gained 21 Lp.

Is this a bug with ranked being down?

replies.body: LP gains and losses are based off how likely you were to win that match. The system expected you to win, so it gave you a normal amount of LP. The match where you gained 21 LP was a match that the system thought you might lose, and since you **did** end up winning it gave you more than usual!
